Codepulse a REST API Blog Post application

Codepulse is a blog application that allows users with assigned roles to perform full CRUD operations on blogs and categories, including image uploads. I built this project while completing the 'REST API Real World Application' Udemy certification. My objective was to learn and master Angular and ASP.NET Core, aiming for excellence in developing full-stack web applications using these technologies.

Skills:

  • Angular CLI
  • Angular Components
  • Angular Routing
  • Angular Services
  • HTTP calls
  • CORS
  • Bootstrap
  • CSS
  • Create reusable components
  • CRUD operations
  • Angular Forms
  • Live Markdown
  • Preview
  • Markdown to HTML
  • Angular Form Elements
  • Authentication and Authorization
  • JWT Tokens
  • Storage Cookie Services
  • Local Storage Interceptors
  • Auth/Route Guards
  • Image Upload in Angular applications
  • Models and Interfaces
  • C# Web APIs using ASPNET Core
  • Use Swagger and Postman to test API data
  • Role based Authorization
  • RxJs Observables
  • Subjects and Subscriptions
